title: Infinite Gacha - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Cheats   Discrimination   Dungeon Master   Dungeons   Elves   Evil Gods   Fairies   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Immortals   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Level System   Lottery   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Maids   Male Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Revenge   Shota   S*aves   Sudden Strength Gain   Summoning Magic   Time Skip   Vampires   Weak to Strong   Witches
author: Meikyou Shisui   明鏡シスイ
description: When Light is kicked out of the Concord of the Tribes, his former comrades instantly turn on him. Light escapes this diabolical act of betrayal by the skin of his teeth…only to find himself in the deepest part of the Abyss, the most dangerous dungeon in the realm! To avoid being eaten by carnivorous monsters, he uses the Unlimited Gacha, his sole magical skill. But where it previously only produced junk items, this time Mei—a gorgeous Level 9999 fighter in a maid outfit—springs forth! Fast forward three years and Light has carved out his own kingdom in this backwater dungeon, summoning more beautiful Level 9999 warriors who swear absolute fealty to him. Now a powerful Level 9999 Overlord himself, Light plans to ascend to the surface and take revenge on his betrayers one by one!>
